channel.title: LaceNote - Server from nothing!
channel.description:
[b][size=24pt]LaceNote[/size][/b] Recent updates and Development thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,493364.msg3607203.html#msg3607203 [b]A little background knowledge:[/b] LaceNote (will be) a Java based MMORPG just like Runescape, however, we will not be copying any of Runescape's models, items, and the client or source code. LaceNote will be made from scratch by our Java Developers (Java Devo Team) The current outline of the website layout will be posted below if you would like to look at it. [b]The Website Team (Webbys)[/b] This website includes Javascript, JQuery, Ajax, PHP, CSS, and HTML. I have currently created the basic layout of what is it now... The website will be updated with better graphics as soon as we get a graphics team. Here is a picture(proof) THE WEBSITE DOES NOT LOOK LIKE THIS ANYMORE! [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/24npf9i.png[/img] [b]The Java Devo Team[/b] We currently do not have any Java Programmers on our staff yet, however I will accept anyone who has basic knowledge of Java! (just sign up at bottom) Our Java Devo Team will have to start the source (and client) from scratch! I know this will take some time, but in the end it will all be worth it because we will have a server that is not illegal because LaceNote will own all the rights. [b]The Graphics Team (G Team)[/b] The G Team will be working with the Webbys to get the site up to par and looking very attractive to the eyes, and the user. They will also be designing some of the items (in PS or PSE or another paint program) which will be saved for future use in the 3D design team. [b]The 3D Team[/b] This group of staff will be taking images from 2D and transforming them into 3D so they can be put into the game! Some people on this staff will also be making emotes. [b]Idea Team (Dream Team)[/b] The Dream Team can come up with actual ideas to put into the game, such as new items, places, think of emotes, and everything else that has to be created will be thought of by them! [b]Signing up for LaceNote[/b] [i]Please Follow the outline if you are interested in working on this development team.[/i]
Team Applying for: Name: Age: Experience: What are some things you have done in this field: Optional- Email: Proof:
For any more information please comment or you may email me at lacenote@live.com

item.title: LaceNote - Server from nothing!
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

Team Applying for: Idea Team
Name: Andrew
Age: 15
Experience: I’ve led about 3-5 different servers being administrator and many others being moderator. I’ve also played many other games where I’ve lead servers and such, you can ask for more if this isn’t enough. I’ve had 3+ years in coding javascript, 1 year in C++/C#, learned MySQL and others some but not enough to call myself knowledgeable. Also messed with PHP and HTML5.
What are some things you have done in this field: When I usually join servers I apply to become the “community manager” where I sort of am the voice for the server, I handle the public and the forums, oraganize it and everything under your advise. Since this server doesn’t really have that, I’ll go for Dream Team.

Optional-
Email: matsterofwar22@hotmail.com
Proof: Servers shut down that I owned/played.

Read full topic

item.title: LaceNote - Server from nothing!
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

[quote=“LaceNote, post:12, topic:396062”]I have knowledge in the following:
Basic Java
I am an expert in JQuery, Javascript, and PHP.
I am good in CSS and HTML however my photoshop is horrific.
Kind of good at 3D game modeling
Good in Ajax

so it’s safe to say that i am looking for a development team not to get my goals finished, but to make the process faster and more efficient. Also yes, I am hoping to have a team soon to help with the client and source coding, however, as far as the website goes i am just looking for staff to help get this done faster and helping maintain things, Runescape was not made by one person.[/quote]
actually runescape was made by one person, some british guy with a small amount of help from his brother who created the game engine in his basement (i think andrew or paul)

Read full topic

Experience: I have been modeling for about a year and a half now. My 3DCG skills are quite efficient for what you will be needing as far as free work goes. A paid modeler would obviously do a better job than me.
What are some things you have done in this field:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,466000.0.html - Won the model contest, although there wasn’t much competition
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,489776.msg3580766.html#msg3580766 - A sculpt of mine
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,475862.msg3550544.html#msg3550544 - My best model completed imo.
http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/8080/acrrr.jpg - My most recent work I am working on, a Bushmaster Remington Assault Combat Rifle.

Optional-
Email: rocknroll80s@live.com
Would prefer if you IM’ed me.
Proof: You can ask anyone in the models section if I’m lying or not, or practically anyone on the forums really.

Read full topic

item.title: LaceNote - Server from nothing!
item.dc:creator: @LaceNote LaceNote
item.description:
@LaceNote wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:396062”]Who are you?

I will apply for an idea man later in the framework if this is found to be legit.

what can you show us first proving what you have done yourself?[/quote]

it is legit, and me… i’m an expert PHP and JQuery im horrible at Java so the game itself has not began however i will be posting some more pictures of how the site works, the features, etc. I will also post an update log on the website and game in this post. (might be located in Server Development though but ill post a link to it when i put it up) The project itself will not begin until we have Java Programmers which i hope we will soon have.

More Pictures: I will post them tomorrow, i have school and need some sleep but I will get some more pictures ASAP

Read full topic
